UseEnumCollections.description:
Description

Wherever possible, useEnumSetorEnumMapinstead ofHashSetandHashMapwhen the keys
are of an enum type. The specialized enum collections are more space- and time-efficient.
This rule reports constructor expressions for hash sets or maps whose key
type is an enum type.

Example(s):

Use this rule by referencing it:
UseEnumCollections.option: This rule has no specific options.
